sentences.en: Aristotle is considered the ancestor of the varying sorts of thought about form, and it's this move that he makes in Poetics that engenders this possibility.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德被认为是各种形式思想的始祖，正是他在《诗学》中做出的这一举动，才产生了这种可能性。

sentences.en: He talked about poetics in architecture.
sentences.cn: 他讲述关于建筑的诗意。

sentences.en: There is no one history here and no one poetics .
sentences.cn: 我们这里没有唯一的历史、唯一的诗学。
